titles.title: National Flood Insurance Program Extension Act
National Flood Insurance Program Extension Act
A bill to reauthorize the National Flood Insurance Program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
National Flood Insurance Program Extension Act
This bill reauthorizes the National Flood Insurance Program through December 1, 2020.
The bill shall take effect as if it had been enacted on May 31, 2019.
